name: viewar-react-boilerplate
description: React boilerplate app for ViewAR SDK

scripts.build: npm run clean && webpack -p --mode production --env production
scripts.start: npm run clean && webpack-dev-server --open --mode development --env development_core
scripts.start:mock: npm run clean && webpack-dev-server --open --mode development --env development_mock
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run karma
scripts.lint: npm run clean && eslint . --format pretty --fix && prettier ./src/**/*.{css,scss,md,json} --write --loglevel silent

author: Karl Hofer <kh@viewar.com>
